scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attack leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income brackets or age ranges, violating customer privacy.
initial_goal: Develop and execute a model inversion attack to infer sensitive customer attributes from the publicly available churn prediction API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - A bank has publicly released a simplified API for a customer churn prediction model for research purposes, neglecting to consider potential model inversion attacks.
